EmailTemplate.subject: Summer roles at NCS with The Challenge still open!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed.
Challenge Yourself To Lead and Mentor Young People
Thank you for your interest in NCS with The Challenge. Applications are still open for paid summer roles!
We are looking for dynamic and inspiring staff to motivate teams of 15-17 year-olds from London, West Midlands and the North West when taking part in NCS with The Challenge. This exciting programme includes outdoor activities, skills development and community volunteering. NCS with The Challenge brings together 15-17 year olds from different backgrounds, builds their confidence and inspires them to make a difference in their local community.
Why should you apply for a summer role?
Fantastic development opportunity – develop your leadership, management and logistical skills on a nationally recognised scheme.
Competitively paid flexible roles - involves many different start dates, contract lengths and residential / non-residential opportunities.
It’s great fun AND you will make a real difference! – the right staff ensure every young person gets the best out of a fantastic programme that has meaningful impact on the next generation.
Apply Now: http://thechallenge.force.com/TCN/New_Job_Application
Best Wishes,
NCS with The Challenge
